title: CARE by Stella Mc Cartney - Dotted Font ID
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704195115im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/5856_logo_4956.gif)

Can someone please identify this font ?

 [‹ help IDing this font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704195115/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45457 "Go to previous forum topic") [Vintage Serif in Ad Headline ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704195115/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45433 "Go to next forum topic")
author: john good

comments.content:
Please use Google to search in the future. Been asked before:  
 [http://www.typophile.com/node/4801](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704195115/http:/www.typophile.com/node/4801 "http://www.typophile.com/node/4801")  
 [http://www.typophile.com/node/44941](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704195115/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44941 "http://www.typophile.com/node/44941")

Thank you stephen,

I know it’s been asked before, I discovered this logo with the forums.  
I’ve tried to find the thread again, and couldn’t find any result, from the search box or from google,  
What did you input in the search box ?

I’m sorry.

If you are using Google to search Typophile, the following may help. Question Google like this ’WHATEVERYOUARESEARCHINGFOR SITE:TYPOPHILE.COM’. _(Like this. It’s magic. ;) Just enter your ’keyword’ and add ’site:typophile.com’.)_

Dav

Wow it works !  
I should use this feature more often.  
thanks
